data.comment: The match is underway. Oud-Heverlee have kicked-off.
Obbi Oulare (Liege) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 21, Aleksandar Boljevic is replacing Maxime Lestienne for the away team.
Nicolas Gavory is booked for the away team.
Sascha Kotysch (Oud-Heverlee) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 45, The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
Liege have kicked-off the second half at Den Dreef Stadium.
The home team have replaced Yohan Croizet with Thibault Vlietinck. This is the first substitution made today by Marc Brys.
In the minute 51, Liege's Nicolas Raskin has been booked in Heverlee.
He's off! Nicolas Gavory is shown a second yellow card.
Liege make their second substitution with Merveille Bokadi replacing Duje Cop.
In the minute 73, Marc Brys is making the team's second substitution at Den Dreef Stadium with Jeremy Perbet replacing Kristiyan Malinov.
Goal! Kamal Sowah gives Oud-Heverlee a 1-0 lead in Heverlee.
Philippe Montanier (Liege) is making a third substitution, with Mehdi Carcela-Gonz√°lez replacing Nicolas Raskin.
In the minute 84, Toon Raemaekers (Oud-Heverlee) has received a yellow card from Jonathan Lardot.
Aboubakar Keita is on a sub for Kamal Sowah for Oud-Heverlee.
It's 1-0 as the referee blows for full-time.
